!Tataru Zu Hestui: Thanks to the great Hestui Totem Spirit, you have mastered the secret language of flame! Now you can communicate with the spirits -- but you cannot yet command them. If you wish to do so, you must either learn the *Names of the 99 Spirits* or acquire the *Wisdom of the 99 Spirits*. Which method will you choose? [Quest _416_PathToOrcShaman tataru_zu_hestui_q0416_11.htm|Learn the Names of the 99 Spirits.] [Quest _416_PathToOrcShaman tataru_zu_hestui_q0416_11c.htm|Acquire the Wisdom of the 99 Spirits.]
